title: Forgotten TB password
content: I'm setting up TB on a new computer. TB keeps asking for my password but the pw I had written down is not correct (it was many years ago). How can I retrieve this password? I have tried my Mozilla account pw and it is not that. Thanks.
creator: mw34

title: Thunderbird136 won't send emails
content:
after installing Tbird136 I could receive but not send emails. Some error message would flash but disappear to quickly to be read.

UPDATE - it turned out to be address book corruption due to the database updating T136 does. I started T136 and exported all my address books then went to the tbird profile and deleted all abook.sqlite files and restarted Tbird and sent emails w/o issues. reimported my exported address books and problem solved.
creator: petermoore1

title: Thunderbird taking 30 or more seconds to send emails
content: I posted this question a while back and the response I got was to start Windows in Safe mode. When I did that I had no internet connection, so obviously it was impossible to test Thunderbird's sending speed. When I posted this reply, no one responded. I read on another forum that the poster had the same problem and had seen a post where it was recommended to change Windows security settings so that it wasn't scanning the Thunderbird logs every time. The poster could no longer find that post although this had had helped him resolve the problem. Does this make any sense to any of you?
creator: s_beecher
